text.zh: Aretalk教育科技有限公司于2015年2月在英国伦敦注册成立，致力于全球在线中文教育、中文教材研发和出版、互联网软件开发和运营、中国传统文化推广。 公司坐落在英国伦敦皇家格林威治区的凤凰之家，南临泰晤士河，与金丝雀码头和伦敦新金融城隔岸相望，为一栋三层意大利风格的英国国家文物二级保护建筑，共2500平方米，设有全英最大的中文书店和全景艺术展厅。同时，抱着让全世界都说汉语的愿望，我们Aretalk也与伦敦凤凰之家，联手合作成立了“中国文化体验中心”项目，为在英国的中文爱好者提供了一个展示中华传统文化的机会，和增进对中国及中文了解的机会。
text.en: Aretalk Education Technology Co., Ltd. was established in London in February 2015. It is dedicated to the global online Chinese education, the development and publication of Chinese textbooks, the development and operation of Internet software, and the promotion of Chinese traditional culture. The company is located in the Phoenix House, Royal Greenwich, London, in the south of Thames River, on the other side of the Canary Wharf and the new London Financial City. It is a three story Italian style two grade British National antiquities protection building, with a total of 2500 square meters with the largest Chinese bookstore and panoramic art exhibition. At the same time, with the desire to make the whole world speak Chinese, Aretalk, together with the Phoenix home in London, has also worked together to establish the "Chinese cultural experience center" project, providing a chance for Chinese Chinese enthusiasts to show Chinese traditional culture and enhance understanding of Chinese and Chinese.

text.zh: AreTalk目前主要有四种课程，包括《快乐学拼音》、《轻松学中文》、《BCT中文教程》及《中文课本》， 覆盖了从基础的拼音课程、GCSE中文、HSK中文，以及商务汉语等，为各个不同基础的汉语学习者制定了相应的课程计划，同时，我们也会对学生进行汉语测试，根据水平相对应的语言能力级别选择适合您的课程
text.en: AreTalk currently offers four types of courses suitable for all learners, including: “Chinese Phonics”, “Easy to Learn Chinese”, BCT Chinese and “Chinese textbook”.

text.zh: 关于课程形式，我们实施小班授课形式，每个班级保证不超过六个人，这样的小班课堂形式给每个学生充分的机会进行交流和互动，促进了学生对汉语学习的积极性和主动性。
text.en: We have designed a class plan corresponding to the needs of every type of Chinese learner. Our syllabus ranges from foundation pinyin classes to GCSE Chinese, HSK Chinese and business Chinese. We will also conduct an assessment of the Chinese level of each of our students and select a class to match your existing language ability.

Our classes are deliberately small, on average between two and six students per class. This ensures that our students receive the optimum amount of attention and assistance from our teachers and best utilises their time in class. In this way, each student will have ample opportunity to interact with native speakers, making them more actively engaged with our dynamic learning style.

text.zh: 每节课（60分钟）：课时卡起售为12课时，最低至5英镑/每课时。按自然年数365天计算，所购买课时卡可用于购买2-6人小班课和预约一对一课程
text.en: Fees: Our classes typically run for 60 minutes. Additionally, using our “study card” preloaded with 48 hours of class time, the lowest class rate is £5 per class. The “study card” can be used to purchase group classes (2-6 students) or one-to-one tuition.

text.zh: 普通话在新加坡，台湾，香港，澳门（澳门）以及中国大陆广泛使用。世界上有10亿以上的人口说普通话，其中8.45亿为汉语母语人士。这就意味着学习普通话，你可以打开与13％的世界人口沟通的大门，AreTalk可以帮助你做到这一点！
text.en: Mandarin is spoken widely throughout Singapore, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Macau (Macao) as well as Mainland China. There are also more than 1 BILLION Mandarin speakers in the world as well as 845 MILLION native speakers. This means that by learning Mandarin, you can un​lock the potential to talk to 13% of the worlds population, and Aretalk is here to help you do it!

text.zh: 另外也可以选择即时直播的课程感受接近真实课堂的体验
text.en: OR students can select a live lesson with a qualified teacher direct from China

text.zh: 我们明白由于人们生活节奏的加快，缺少时间加入课堂学习，或者仅仅只想在参加直播课前增加信心，那么，我们AreTalk准备了上百节录播课，来满足此类人士的需求。
text.en: We understand that some people have tight schedules, or that you'd rather just build up your confidence before going head first into a live lesson. With Aretalk, we have hundreds of pre recorded lessons so that you can learn where you want, whenever you want!

text.zh: AreTalk通过直接来自中国的直播课程让你学到真正的实用汉语。每班最多6名学生，也可选择1对1的学习方式，这种方式达到了接近了真实课堂的感觉。
text.en: Aretalk brings the classroom to you with Live Lessons direct from China. With a maximum of 6 students per class and the option of 1 to 1 tuition, this is the closest you'll get to being in a real classroom.

text.zh: 我们AreTalk电台作为一种学习汉语的辅助方式，无论你在哪里，在做什么，都可以打开我们的电台，了解关于中国的最新资讯。
text.en: Extend your learning outside of the school walls with our radio stories! Whether it's before you go to bed, or whilst you're eating breakfast. Our radio stories help you learn whatever the time.

text.zh: 在课堂上有不清楚的地方，都可以随时给我们老师留言，她们都会及时回复。
text.en: Finished a lesson but you're unsure about something? Just drop your teacher a question! Just like a teacher in your own school, they're always happy to help.

text.zh: Aretalk教育科技有限公司于2015年2月在英国伦敦注册成立，致力于全球在线中文教育、中文教材研发和出版、互联网软件开发和运营、中国传统文化推广。 公司坐落在英国伦敦皇家格林威治区的凤凰之家，南临泰晤士河，与金丝雀码头和伦敦新金融城隔岸相望，为一栋三层意大利风格的英国国家文物二级保护建筑，共2500平方米，设有全英最大的中文书店和全景艺术展厅。同时，抱着让全世界都说汉语的愿望，我们Aretalk也与伦敦凤凰之家，联手合作成立了“中国文化体验中心”项目，为在英国的中文爱好者提供了一个展示中华传统文化的机会，和增进对中国及中文了解的机会。
text.en: AreTalk Education Tech Ltd is an education company headquartered in London with offices in Dalian, China. Its main offering is an online Mandarin Chinese teaching platform. The company was founded in 2015, and is dedicated to providing an easy, effective and affordable way of learning Chinese. The company is located at the House of Phoenix's head offices: a three-storey, 2,500m2 Italian-Style National Heritage Grade II listed building located on the south bank of the River Thames in the Royal Borough of Greenwich. The building houses the largest Chinese bookstore and art gallery in the UK. Additionally, we have partnered with the House of Phoenix in London to set up the "China Cultural Experience Centre”. The Centre's goal is to provide an opportunity for those interested in Chinese culture to have an authentic China experience, and in doing so enhance their understanding of China and the Chinese language.

text.zh: 适合零基础入门学习者，是在多年教学实践的基础上，结合幼儿心理和智力特点，巧妙地设计带有启发性的精美插图，使拼音字母更加直观、形象，便于记忆。教材以声母、韵母、整体认读音节、拼音知识的讲解为基本内容，搭配实物图片、词语短句，来指导学生进行正确的发音与书写。同时将朗朗上口、儿歌式的拼读规则穿插其中，大大增强了学习的趣味性。课程共16课时，共学习45个拼音，200余个汉字，以图片、汉字、音节相结合的方式，帮助学生快速地整体认读音节和汉字拼读。
text.en: Suitable for students (children) with no previous experience learning Chinese. The course consists of 16 classes, and includes a total of 45 pinyin words and 200 Chinese characters. The course uses a combination of photographs, Chinese characters, and pinyin words to help students quickly recognise and read Chinese (both pinyin and characters).

text.zh: 适合4-10岁中文初学者，基于生动有趣的故事情节，重点培养学生开口说中文的能力。绘本是许多孩子接触的第一本书，而这本书中不仅有文字，还有最吸引孩子眼球的图画，同时图文结合的关系能激发孩子的阅读兴趣。绘本的阅读形式是多种多样的，其中有自主阅读，也有亲子阅读，还有集体阅读。我们的绘本内容包含动物、数字、颜色、方位、形状、生活常识等。通过生动的方式让孩子在游戏中快乐学习汉语。
text.en: Suitable for beginner-level children aged 4-10. The classes use lively and funstory books, and focus on encouraging spoken Chinese. We have a wide range of illustrated Chinese story books, which cover topics such as animals, numbers, colours, directions, shapes, daily life, and others.

text.zh: 以考试政策为基准，制定科学的教程体系，以体育与休闲运动，旅游交通，商业、工作与就业，传媒与文化等内容，提升学生中文口语和写作能力。以家居附近与外出，客户服务与交易往来，未来计划、教育与工作等内容，提升学生的听力与阅读能力。
text.en: GCSE Chinese Language Examination Courses use the examination policy as a benchmark to formulate a scientific tutorial system to enhance students' Chinese speaking and writing skills. The following topics are used for the spoken and written components: –sports and leisure activities, tourism, transportation, commerce, work and employment, media and culture. Listening and reading capabilities focus on the following topics: the local area, customer service and doing deals, future plans, education and work.

text.zh: 由北京语言大学出版社出版，共八册，120课时，适合初级中文学习者，整套课程通过语言、话题和文化的自然结合，到词汇、汉语知识学习及 语言交流技能的培养，旨在为汉语学习者奠定扎实基础。在教学过程中，注重对学生听、说、读、写四项交际技能的培养。
text.en: “Easy to Learn Chinese” is published by the Beijing Language and Culture University Press. It has eight volumes, a total of 120 hours’ class time and is suitable for beginner level students. The course seamlessly combines language, topics and Chinese culture, while integrating vocabulary, Chinese knowledge learning and language communication skills. The ultimate aim is to lay a solid linguistic foundation for our students. Our teaching process places great importance on cultivating the four key communicative skills: listening, speaking, reading and writing.

text.zh: 由人民教育出版社出版，共5册，100课时。主要面向工作生活节奏快、完整时间少、零散时间多、难以进入正式课堂学习，但有强烈工作和职业需求的商务汉语学习者，以及所有希望学习汉语、了解中国的国际朋友。课程学习完毕，可掌握5700余个词汇量，提高中文学习者的商务汉语听说交际能力，并在提高听说交际能力的同时，逐步提高读写能力。
text.en: “BCT Chinese” published by the People's Education Press, has 5 volumes, and 100 hours’ class time. It is principally aimed at business Chinese learners with busy schedules and limited time to spare on classroom study. The course is designed for business professionals who either have a professional requirement for Chinese, or hope to have a better understanding of the Chinese culture. Upon completion of the course, students will be able to understand more than 5,700 Chinese words, and will have improved their communicative skills in business Chinese. Through the process of improving their listening and speaking skills, students will also gradually increase their reading and writing abilities.

text.zh: 我们也开设暨南大学的《中文》教材，这套教材是中华人民共和国国务院侨务办公室委托暨南大学华文学院为海外华侨、华人子弟学习中文而编写的。在内容上由浅入深、循序渐进，并采用彩色图文编排，是一套较为全面、完整、系统的语言学习教材。本教材的教学目的是使学生通过十二册教材的学习与训练，能具备汉语普通话的听、说、读、写的基本能力，同时了解中华文化的基本常识，为今后进一步学习中国语言文化打下良好的基础。
text.en: Jin'Nan Chinese-designed for overseas students who plan to attend an after-school course, introduces 2,500 Chinese characters, covers a wide range of topics and provides an overview of Chinese culture including Chinese geography, and history. This course introduces the basic knowledge of Chinese, including the characters, Pinyin system, sentence patterns and short conversations. With simple words of the contents, students will learn Chinese language and culture easily.

text.zh: 我们为企业客户提供定制中文学习方案。我们与每位企业客户密切沟通，了解企业所从事的行业及特点，为其学习需求设计专门的解决方案。由于我们的每节中文课程都是为贵公司量身定做的，因此课程内容都与贵公司及所处行业密切相关。我们会根据您的业务特征为您定制课程，并将贵公司所从事的业务及介绍编排进我们的网络课堂，让更多人对您的公司增进了解。我们每节课也会派对该行业熟悉的教师来上，同时也会讲这些定制课程上传到我们的app，不仅可供员工随时学习，而且注册我们app的用户也都可以点击观看。同时，我们还会有合作媒体投放，会让跟多海外用户通过我们的平台关注到您的企业。
text.en: We offer customised classes for corporate clients who are interested in Mandarin Chinese training. We work with each corporate client very closely to understand specific needs. Because we design each Chinese training lessons around you, the curriculum is always relevant to your particular enterprise or industry. We will also tailor our lessons around what skills are most needed for you, whether it be speaking, listening, reading, or writing. Whether your business is in China or you're working with Chinese employees or other Chinese companies, our Chinese training lessons can help you further your goals. We will also add your companies’ businesses to our other online classes for our business classes, as a way of promoting your company. text.zh: 双师课堂是一种全新的教学模式，从一个老师教学升级为两个老师负责学生的学习：一位是主讲老师，以直播的形式授课；一位是辅导老师，负责课堂管理和课后针对性学习辅导。两个老师分工明确，调动学生对汉语的学习热情，鼓励学生积极的运用汉语进行对话。 对于双师课堂这种教学模式，采用的显示屏至关重要，我们AreTalk的双师课堂采用120吋（2.66米×1.5米）光学抗光幕作为超大显示屏，还原真实色彩，给我们的学生良好舒适的视觉体验。
text.en: Recent educational thinking across the fields of multicultural education has highlighted the relevance of teaching Mandarin Chinese in modern English primary and secondary schools. Progressive schools have already begun to introduce Mandarin into their curricular and extra-curricular timetables: a movement initiated particularly by primary schools, who are soon to be required to teach at least one Modern Foreign Language at Key Stage 2.

text.zh: 双师课堂是一种全新的教学模式，从一个老师教学升级为两个老师负责学生的学习：一位是主讲老师，以直播的形式授课；一位是辅导老师，负责课堂管理和课后针对性学习辅导。两个老师分工明确，调动学生对汉语的学习热情，鼓励学生积极的运用汉语进行对话。 对于双师课堂这种教学模式，采用的显示屏至关重要，我们AreTalk的双师课堂采用120吋（2.66米×1.5米）光学抗光幕作为超大显示屏，还原真实色彩，给我们的学生良好舒适的视觉体验。
text.en: In order to help more schools start their Chinese classes, AreTalk now provides online customised Chinese programme for mainly primary and secondary schools in the UK, this programme is ideal for schools wishing to improve their students’ speaking skills. Classes will primarily focus on speaking activities such as role plays, dialogues and interviews to provide maximum opportunity to practice speaking Chinese in a variety of different contexts. Its syllabus also builds vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation.

text.zh: 双师如何配合:主讲老师与主讲老师研讨课程，集体备课。上课时，在教室里，辅导老师陪伴学生，督促管理，及时答疑解惑。课后，辅导老师语音批改作业，个性化点评，发送个性化练习和报告，跟家长保持高频沟通。
text.en: Our teaching style is fun, multi-sensory and highly interactive; we encourage students to speak at our classes because we believe that is the best ways to allow children to excel at language.

text.zh: 双师课堂优势：双师课堂设计的初衷便是结合线上线下教学的优点。一个授课老师同时给多个平行班级上课，充分放大名师的价值；每个班辅导老师的全部精力都用于班级管理和教学服务，上课纪律和听课效率、课后测评及针对性的作业布置、家长反馈与沟通等。尤其是辅导老师一对一和学生沟通的环节，大大弥补了班课学习中老师和学生沟通不足的问题，而这也是同一个老师班课退课率高于其一对一退课率的重要因素。
text.en: We are more than happy to discuss schools' individual requirements, but as a suggestion we provide a scheme of work involving lots of speaking, listening, singing and games, as well as reading and writing the Chinese script. Children will learn and use vocabulary including numbers, colours, animals, self and family, parts of the body, as well as general skills for building conversation and mastering sentence structure. The programme can be delivered by weekly lessons as part of your school's curriculum; or a lunchtime, before-school, or after-school club on a day to suit your current schedule. Our teachers have extensive Mandarin Chinese language teaching experience and is able to provide a recent standard of teaching!
